steps.nodeStepDescription: Upgrades Glide to provide an initial boost of speed.
A grenade that splits into many submunitions and covers a large area with explosions.
Damaging an enemy with Energy Drain immediately restores a significant portion of your health.
Nova Bomb splits into three projectiles.
Nova Bomb tracks enemies.
Enemies killed by any of your abilities explode.
Killing enemies with Nova Bomb or any grenade triggers Energy Drain and restores your health.
Increases the range of Axion Bolt seekers and the duration of the Vortex effect of Nova Bomb and Vortex Grenade.
A short distance teleport which replaces Glide.
Increases the size of explosions created by Nova Bomb and grenades.
Slam a target with a wave of force.
A powerful melee attack which drains energy from enemies and uses it to reduce the cooldown of your grenade.
Damaging an enemy with Energy Drain reduces the cooldown of Nova Bomb.
Run faster.
Jump and then press  again while in the air to activate Glide.
Upgrades Glide for better directional control while in the air.
A bolt of Void Light which forks into smaller bolts on impact which seek toward enemies.
A grenade that creates a Vortex which continually damages enemies trapped inside.
Nova Bomb travels farther and faster.
Nova Bomb creates a Vortex which continually damages enemies trapped inside.
Hurl an explosive bolt of Void Light at the enemy, disintegrating those caught within its blast.
Training focused on toughness and speed.
Training focused on battle recovery and speed.
Damaging an enemy with Energy Drain increases weapon and movement speed.
Increases the duration of the Energy Drain effect.
Training focused on raw speed.
Training focused on battle recovery and toughness.
Training focused on toughness at all costs.
Training focused on all attributes.
